item.title: SPRING GARDEN ON FYAH!
item.description: --- title: SPRING GARDEN ON FYAH! author: JR date: '2018-10-19' slug: hott categories: [Visualisation] tags: [Barbados, Visualisation] data: '2018-10-19T21:37:50-04:00' Summary: 'Charting Local Warming In Barbados' image: 'images/commmon/rays.jpg.' weight: 1 output: blogdown::html_page: dev: "svg" --- The Question Barbados is hot. It was always hot, its a tropical paradise in the Caribbean its supposed to be hot but for Bajans, in recent times it feels hotter than ever before.
